consent.description: Ka bayar da izini kawai idan kana amince da wannan shafin ko manhaja. Ba dole ka yarda da duk izini ba.
consent.remember-label: Ka tuna da wannan shawarar nan gaba. Manhajan ba za ta iya neman ƙarin izini ba tare da izinin ka ba.
consent.requested-permissions-label: Manhajan tana neman samun dama ga izini masu zuwa:
error.description: Kuskure ya faru tare da wannan saƙo:
error.support-email-link: Idan matsalar ta ci gaba, don Allah tuntuɓi {contactSupportEmail}
error.title: Kuskure ya faru
identities.messages.1010003: Don Allah ka tabbatar da wannan aiki ta hanyar tabbatar da cewa kai ne.
identities.messages.1010004: Don Allah ka kammala ƙalubalen tantancewa na biyu.
identities.messages.1010008: Ci gaba da maɓallin kayan aiki
identities.messages.1010012: Shirya na'urar WebAuthn ka (misali maɓallin tsaro, na'urar daukar hoto ta halitta, ...) sannan ka danna ci gaba.
identities.messages.1010014: An aika lambar zuwa adireshin da ka bayar. Idan ba ka karɓa ba, don Allah ka duba rubutun adireshin ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.1010016: Ka yi ƙoƙarin shiga da "{duplicateIdentifier}", amma wannan imel ɗin yana amfani da wani asusun. Shiga zuwa asusun ka da ɗaya daga cikin zaɓuɓɓukan da ke ƙasa don ƙara asusun ka "{duplicateIdentifier}" a "{provider}" a matsayin wata hanyar shiga.
identities.messages.1040005: An aika lambar zuwa adireshin/adiresoshin da ka bayar. Idan ba ka karɓi saƙo ba, duba rubutun adireshin ka sake gwadan rajistar.
identities.messages.1040009: Don Allah ka zaɓi takaddun shaida don tabbatar da kanka.
identities.messages.1050010: Waɗannan lambobin dawo da baya ne. Don Allah ka ajiye su a wuri mai aminci!
identities.messages.1050011: Tabbatar da lambobin dawo da baya
identities.messages.1050014: An yi amfani da asiri a {used_at, date, long}
identities.messages.1060001: Ka sami nasarar dawo da asusun ka. Don Allah ka canza kalmar sirrin ka ko saita wata hanyar shiga (misali shiga ta zamantakewa) a cikin minti {privileged_session_expires_at_unix_until_minutes} masu zuwa.
identities.messages.1060002: An aika imel ɗin da ke ɗauke da hanyar dawo da asusun zuwa adireshin imel da ka bayar. Idan ba ka karɓi imel ba, duba rubutun adireshin kuma ka tabbatar da cewa kana amfani da adireshin da ka yi rajista da shi.
identities.messages.1060003: An aika imel ɗin da ke ɗauke da lambar dawo da asusun zuwa adireshin imel da ka bayar. Idan ba ka karɓi imel ba, duba rubutun adireshin kuma ka tabbatar da cewa kana amfani da adireshin da ka yi rajista da shi.
identities.messages.1060004: An aika lambar dawo da asusun zuwa "{masked_address}". Idan ba ka karɓa ba, duba rubutun adireshin kuma ka tabbatar da cewa kana amfani da adireshin da ka yi rajista da shi.
identities.messages.1060005: Ka dawo da damar shiga asusun ka ta hanyar bayar da cikakken adireshin dawo da asusun ka.
identities.messages.1060006: Ta yaya kake so ka dawo da asusun ka?
identities.messages.1070015: Don Allah ka kammala ƙalubalen captcha don ci gaba.
identities.messages.1080001: An aika imel ɗin da ke ɗauke da hanyar tabbatarwa zuwa adireshin imel da ka bayar. Idan ba ka karɓi imel ba, duba rubutun adireshin kuma ka tabbatar da cewa kana amfani da adireshin da ka yi rajista da shi.
identities.messages.1080002: Ka sami nasarar tabbatar da adireshin imel ɗin ka.
identities.messages.1080003: An aika imel ɗin da ke ɗauke da lambar tabbatarwa zuwa adireshin imel da ka bayar. Idan ba ka karɓi imel ba, duba rubutun adireshin kuma ka tabbatar da cewa kana amfani da adireshin da ka yi rajista da shi.
identities.messages.4000002: Don Allah ka shigar da {property} ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4000003: tsawo dole ya zama >= {min_length}, amma an samu {actual_length}
identities.messages.4000005: Ba za a iya amfani da kalmar wucewa ba saboda {reason}.
identities.messages.4000006: Takaddun shaidar da aka bayar ba su dace ba, duba kurakuran rubutu a cikin kalmar sirrin ka ko sunan mai amfani, adireshin imel, ko lambar waya.
identities.messages.4000007: Akwai asusu tare da irin wannan mai ganowa (imel, waya, sunan mai amfani, ...) tuni.
identities.messages.4000008: Lambar tantancewa da aka bayar ba ta dace ba, don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4000009: Ba a sami ko wane mai ganowa na shiga ba. Ka manta da saita su? Wannan kuma na iya faruwa saboda rashin daidaituwar sabar.
identities.messages.4000010: Har yanzu asusu bai kunna ba. Ka manta da tabbatar da adireshin imel ɗin ka?
identities.messages.4000011: Ba ka da na'urar TOTP da aka saita.
identities.messages.4000012: An riga an yi amfani da wannan lambar dawo da baya.
identities.messages.4000013: Ba ka da na'urar WebAuthn da aka saita.
identities.messages.4000014: Ba ka da lambobin dawo da baya da aka saita.
identities.messages.4000015: Wannan asusu ba ya wanzu ko ba shi da maɓallin tsaro da aka saita.
identities.messages.4000016: Lambar dawo da baya ba ta dace ba.
identities.messages.4000017: tsawo dole ya zama <= {max_length}, amma an samu {actual_length}
identities.messages.4000018: dole ya zama >= {minimum} amma an sami {actual}
identities.messages.4000019: dole ya zama > {minimum} amma an sami {actual}
identities.messages.4000020: dole ya zama <= {maximum} amma an sami {actual}
identities.messages.4000021: dole ya zama < {maximum} amma an sami {actual}
identities.messages.4000023: matsakaicin {max_items} abubuwa an yarda, amma an sami {actual_items} abubuwa
identities.messages.4000024: mafi ƙarancin {min_items} abubuwa an yarda, amma an sami {actual_items} abubuwa
identities.messages.4000025: abubuwa a fihirisin {index_a} da {index_b} sun yi daidai
identities.messages.4000027: Akwai asusu tare da irin wannan mai ganowa (imel, waya, sunan mai amfani, ...) tuni. Don Allah ka shiga zuwa asusun ka da ke akwai don haɗa bayanan ka na zamantakewa.
identities.messages.4000028: Ka yi ƙoƙarin shiga da {credential_identifier_hint} wanda wani asusu ke amfani da shi tuni. Kana iya shiga ta amfani da {available_credential_types_list}. Kana iya shiga ta amfani da ɗaya daga cikin masu bayar da shiga ta zamantakewa masu zuwa: {Available_oidc_providers_list}.
identities.messages.4000029: dole ya yi daidai da akai-akai {expected}
identities.messages.4000031: Ba za a iya amfani da kalmar wucewa ba saboda tana kama da mai ganowa.
identities.messages.4000032: Kalmar wucewa dole ta kasance aƙalla {min_length} haruffa tsayi, amma an sami {actual_length}.
identities.messages.4000033: Kalmar wucewa dole ta kasance a mafi yawa {max_length} haruffa tsayi, amma an sami {actual_length}.
identities.messages.4000034: An sami kalmar wucewa a cikin ɓarna bayanai kuma ba za a iya amfani da ita ba.
identities.messages.4000035: Wannan asusu ba ya wanzu ko bai saita shiga da lambar ba.
identities.messages.4000036: Halayen da aka bayar ba su dace da halayen da aka haɗa da wannan gudanar ba.
identities.messages.4000037: Wannan asusu ba ya wanzu ko ba shi da hanyar shiga da aka saita.
identities.messages.4000038: Tabbatar da captcha ya gaza, don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4010001: Gudanar da shiga ya ƙare {expired_at_unix_since_minutes} mintuna da suka wuce, don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4010002: Ba a sami dabarar shiga da ita ba. Ka cika fom yadda ya kamata?
identities.messages.4010003: Ba a sami dabarar yi rajista da ita ba. Ka cika fom yadda ya kamata?
identities.messages.4010004: Ba a sami dabarar sabunta saitunan ka ba. Ka cika fom yadda ya kamata?
identities.messages.4010005: Ba a sami dabarar dawo da asusun ka ba. Ka cika fom yadda ya kamata?
identities.messages.4010006: Ba a sami dabarar tabbatar da asusun ka ba. Ka cika fom yadda ya kamata?
identities.messages.4010007: An riga an kammala buƙatar cikin nasara kuma ba za a iya sake gwadawa ba.
identities.messages.4010008: Lambar shiga ba ta dace ba ko an riga an yi amfani da ita. Don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4010009: Takaddun shaida da aka haɗa ba su daidaita ba.
identities.messages.4010010: Adireshin da ka shigar ba ya dace da kowane adiresoshin da aka sani a cikin asusu na yanzu.
identities.messages.4040001: Gudanar da rajista ya ƙare {expired_at_unix_since_minutes} mintuna da suka wuce, don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4040002: An riga an kammala buƙatar cikin nasara kuma ba za a iya sake gwadawa ba.
identities.messages.4040003: Lambar rajista ba ta dace ba ko an riga an yi amfani da ita. Don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4050001: Gudanar da saituna ya ƙare {expired_at_unix_since_minutes} mintuna da suka wuce, don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4060001: An riga an kammala buƙatar cikin nasara kuma ba za a iya sake gwadawa ba.
identities.messages.4060002: Gudanar da dawo da asusun ya kai ga yanayin gazawa kuma dole a sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4060004: Alamar dawo da asusun ba ta dace ba ko an riga an yi amfani da ita. Don Allah ka sake gwadan gudanar.
identities.messages.4060005: Gudanar da dawo da asusun ya ƙare {expired_at_unix_since_minutes} mintuna da suka wuce, don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4060006: Lambar dawo da asusun ba ta dace ba ko an riga an yi amfani da ita. Don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4070001: Alamar tabbatarwa ba ta dace ba ko an riga an yi amfani da ita. Don Allah ka sake gwadan gudanar.
identities.messages.4070002: An riga an kammala buƙatar cikin nasara kuma ba za a iya sake gwadawa ba.
identities.messages.4070003: Gudanar da tabbatarwa ya kai ga yanayin gazawa kuma dole a sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4070005: Gudanar da tabbatarwa ya ƙare {expired_at_unix_since_minutes} mintuna da suka wuce, don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
identities.messages.4070006: Lambar tabbatarwa ba ta dace ba ko an riga an yi amfani da ita. Don Allah ka sake gwadawa.

settings.subtitle-instructions: A nan zaka iya sarrafa saituna da suka shafi asusun ka. Ka tuna cewa wasu ayyuka suna buƙatar ka sake tantancewa.
settings.subtitle: Sabunta saitunan asusun ka

settings.messages.toast-title.error: Ba a iya sabunta saituna ba
verification.title: Tabbatar da asusun ka
verification.subtitle: Ka shigar da adireshin imel da aka haɗa da asusun ka don tabbatar da shi
two-step.password.title: Kalmar wucewa
two-step.password.description: Ka shigar da kalmar sirrin da aka haɗa da asusun ka
two-step.code.title: Lambar imel
two-step.code.description: Za a aika lambar tabbatarwa zuwa imel ɗin ka
two-step.webauthn.title: Maɓallin tsaro
two-step.webauthn.description: Yi amfani da maɓallin tsaro don tantancewa
two-step.passkey.title: Passkey (an ba da shawara)
two-step.passkey.description: Yi amfani da na'urar ka don sawun yatsa ko gane fuska
two-step.passkey.description.error: Ba a iya loda ɗakunan karatu da ake buƙata don amfani da Passkey ka. Don Allah ka sake gwadawa daga baya.
two-step.totp.title: Yi amfani da Manhajan Tantancewa ka (TOTP)
two-step.totp.description: Yi amfani da lambar lokaci ɗaya mai lamba 6 daga manhajan tantancewa ka
two-step.lookup_secret.title: Lambar dawo da baya
two-step.lookup_secret.description: Yi amfani da ɗaya daga cikin lambobin dawo da baya masu lamba 8 don tantancewa
card.header.parts.oidc: mai bayar da sabis na zamantakewa
settings.totp.title: Manhajan Tantancewa
settings.totp.description: Ka ƙara Manhajan Tantancewa na TOTP zuwa asusun ka don inganta tsaron asusun ka. Manhajar Tantancewa da suka shahara sune LastPass da Google Authenticator
settings.totp.info.not-linked: Don kunna ka duba lambar QR tare da manhajan tantancewa ka shigar da lambar.
settings.totp.info.linked: A halin yanzu kana da manhajan tantancewa da aka haɗa.
settings.lookup_secret.title: Lambobin Dawo da Baya (mataki na biyu)
settings.lookup_secret.description: Lambobin dawo da baya sune madadin tsaro don 2FA, suna ba ka damar dawo da asusu idan ka rasa na'urar 2FA ka.
settings.oidc.title: Asusun da aka haɗa
settings.oidc.description: Ka haɗa mai bayar da shiga ta zamantakewa da asusun ka.
settings.oidc.info: Ana iya amfani da asusun da aka haɗa daga waɗannan masu bayarwa don shiga zuwa asusun ka
settings.webauthn.info: Ana amfani da Alamun Kayan Aiki don tantancewa na mataki na biyu ko a matsayin mataki na farko tare da Passkeys
settings.passkey.title: Sarrafa Passkeys
account-linking.title: Haɗa asusu
consent.title: Ba da izini ga {party}
consent.subtitle: Manhajan wani ɓangare na uku tana son samun bayanai da aka haɗa da asusun ka {identifier}.
consent.scope.openid.title: Ainihi
consent.scope.openid.description: Yana ba manhajan damar tabbatar da ainihin ka. Wannan ya zama dole don tantancewa da ƙwarewar shiga da aminci.
consent.scope.offline_access.title: Samun Damar Layi
consent.scope.offline_access.description: Yana ba wannan manhajan damar kiyaye ka a shiga ko da ba ka amfani da ita sosai ba.
consent.scope.profile.title: Bayanan Bayanan Sirri
consent.scope.profile.description: Yana ba da damar samun bayanan bayanan sirrin ka na asali, har da sunan mai amfani, suna na farko, da suna na ƙarshe.
consent.scope.email.title: Adireshin Imel
consent.scope.email.description: Karɓar adireshin imel ɗin ka da yanayin tabbatarwa.
consent.scope.address.title: Adireshin Jiki
consent.scope.phone.title: Lambar Waya
consent.scope.phone.description: Karɓar lambar waya ka da yanayin tabbatarwa.
error.instructions: Don Allah ka sake gwadawa cikin 'yan mintuna ko ka tuntuɓi mai aiki da gidan yanar gizon.
error.footer.text: Lokacin da kake ba da rahoton wannan kuskuren, don Allah ka haɗa wannan bayanin:
